bibl.title: Horned Crown - an Epigraphic Evidence.
Études et Travaux (Studia i Prace). Travaux du Centre d'archéologie méditerranéenne de l'Académie Polonaise des Sciences

bibl.note: Discusses the representation of dignitaries wearing horned crowns on paintings (with Greek inscriptions) in the Faras Cathedral and at Abd el-Qadir (XIIth-XIIIth cent.).
bibl.seg: Stefan Jakobielski, Horned Crown - an Epigraphic Evidence.
Discusses the representation of dignitaries wearing horned crowns on paintings (with Greek inscriptions) in the Faras Cathedral and at Abd el-Qadir (XIIth-XIIIth cent.).
